name: iPad sleeve - handmade crochet iPad cover - striped ocean blue and grey
description:
keep your iPad cozy when traveling with this crocheted cover. this sleeve will keep your electronic friend free from needless scratches or bumps while bouncing around with you on your daily jaunts to work, school or to the moon and back. a great investment to keep one of the most prized toys happy!

*** please note that our covers are snug enough to fit every and any old or new version of the iPad thus far ***

completely handmade, machine washable and durable. crocheted with100% acrylic yarn, love and good intentions all by theLOVEstitch.

name: chain warmer necklace infinity loop "mister T" scarf crocheted - barley brown tan
description:
yep that's right...the mister T scarf" inspired by his gold chain necklaces and notable swagger.

this crocheted chain warmer necklace or infinity loop scarf is an attention grabber that will keep you warm and stylin'. "i pity da fool" that doesn't cop one while they can.

made from a soft acrylic/wool blend. there are 10 separate crocheted chains, the shortest chain starting at approximately 24inches, the longest about 48 inches with the rest that fill the in betweens to complete this lovely piece.

name: handmade crochet bow ring - 3 pack - you pick the colors
description:
his listing is for THREE crochet bow rings. you pick the colors you'd like and i'll make them just for you. at check out please note which colors you'd prefer in the "note to seller box" from this list:

sea foam green
sunshine yellow
pale pink
tangerine orange
kelly green
royal blue
black
cream
crimson red
pastel purple


these knitted bow rings are a cute addition to any ensemble. get in touch with your inner girlie self and "put a bow on it" with this hand stitched crochet bow ring. attached to a sliver plated adjustable ring to fit your finger perfectly.

bow size is approximately 2inches x 1inch and made with 100% cotton crochet thread. every stitch is crocheted by hand by me with love.

name: dapper knit bow tie crocheted in PEACOCK blue
description:
**** father's day gift idea for the dapper dad in your life ****

a perfect accessory for anyone who's into dapper fashions or trending hipster threads. this crocheted bow tie is attached to a traditional bow tie clip for easy functionality. clip on and you're off! who could ask for anything more?

each stitch is hand crocheted with 100% wool. the bow tie is approximately 2inches X 4inches and can be attached by the clip on the backside to any collar, cardigan or lapel.

name: pick 3 thin crochet headbands
description:
can't decide which colors in the summer headband collection you'd like to take home with you.  buy three and be merry!

please note at check out which three colors you'd like -

charcoal gray
ocean blue
cloud white
buff
bright coral 
sunshine yellow
